difficultySettings.title: Difficulty Settings
difficultySettings.tabDescription: Configure AI character's conversation style for each difficulty level. These settings apply to text, TTS, and real-time voice modes.
difficultySettings.resetCompleteDesc: Difficulty settings have been restored to defaults.

guide.title: Difficulty Settings Guide
guide.level1: Friendly tutorial mode for first-time users
guide.level3: Challenge mode requiring logical arguments and persuasion
guide.level4: Advanced mode with real-world pressure requiring quick responses
guide.applyNote: Changed settings will apply to new conversations.

1.name: Beginner Difficulty
1.description: Very friendly and safe practice conversation. Helps users feel comfortable even when making mistakes, suggesting correct answers or better expressions first.
1.responseLength: 2-3 sentences. Explain key points simply, rephrasing difficult expressions in easier terms.
1.tone: Gentle and encouraging. Praise first even for mistakes, then softly suggest corrections.
1.pressure: Almost no conflict or pressure. Only present everyday or low-risk situations.
1.feedback: Explain first, then gently encourage participation.

2.name: Basic Difficulty
2.description: Friendly but realistic conversation. Users experience workplace-level feedback and light conflicts while practicing independent thinking.
2.tone: Basically friendly but honestly points out issues when needed.
2.pressure: Mild conflicts and pressure exist. Constantly reminds of realistic constraints.
2.feedback: Provides explanations but accompanies questions to encourage self-reflection.

3.name: Challenge Difficulty
3.description: Conversation with workplace-level pressure and conflicts. Users must present in-depth judgment and logic to resolve situations.
3.responseLength: 3-5 sentences. Includes situation explanation + problem identification + additional demands.
3.tone: Polite but objective and results-focused. Demands logic and evidence.
3.pressure: Clear conflicts and moderate to high pressure.
3.feedback: Specifically points out mistakes and omissions, requiring corrections and improvements.

4.name: Extreme Difficulty
4.description: Includes near-extreme crisis and conflict situations. Users must respond coolly under high pressure.
4.responseLength: 1-5 sentences. Direct when short, detailed strong demands when long.
4.tone: Very demanding and direct, may feel cold at times.
4.feedback: Immediate strong feedback on mistakes and contradictions. Retry demands are delivered with pressure.

landing.title: AI Roleplay Communication Training
landing.description: Develop your communication skills by conversing with AI in realistic workplace scenarios. Improve with real-time feedback and strategic analysis.
landing.feature1Desc: Practice conversations with AI personas playing various roles like managers, colleagues, customers, and executives in realistic situations.
landing.feature2Desc: Plan your conversation order in advance and develop optimal communication strategies for each counterpart.
landing.feature3Desc: Get real-time emotion analysis and scores during conversations, and receive comprehensive feedback reports upon completion.
landing.loginHint: Sign in easily with Google, GitHub, Apple, or email
landing.demoItem3: Mediating opinion differences with team members

intro.title: AI Roleplay Training
intro.subtitle: An innovative communication skills training system with AI
intro.step1Desc: Practice various real-world situations including negotiation, presentation, and conflict resolution.
intro.step2Desc: Simulate real work situations with AI characters of various personalities and roles.
intro.step3Desc: Monitor AI's emotional changes in real-time during conversations to improve communication skills.
intro.step4Desc: Receive detailed AI analysis and improvement suggestions after completing conversations.
intro.bubble1: I want to learn negotiation skills!
